name: Death of the King
description: King Vytautas II has been assassinated by LAF terrorists. With his death, LIthuania needs to step on a new path to evade the chaos.

name: Maintain Civil Governance
description: Narutowicz against the advice of many has chosen to maintain a civilian run government during these troubling times. Though the road to recovery will be longer, Narutowicz insists that civil liberties can not be neglected even in times of crisis.

name: Gain Farmer Support
description: Lithuania economic backbone is its agriculture and with the LAF recruiting from Lithuania's rural population, gaining the support and listening to our farmers needs has become paramount.

name: Reach Out to the Bund
description: The Bund is still holding the cards in the economical sector of Lithuania, Narutowicz must seek their support

name: State of the Economy
description: With the economy showing signs of improvement and stability slowly returning to Lithuania, Narutowicz can now focus on correcting the wrongs of the previous government

name: Seek Southern Support
description: Bia≈Çystok to the south has forever been a thorn to Lithuania, but with Narutowicz at the helm, he seeks to bring the peoples of Lithuania together united under one banner. Though there are many within the Polish community who against such a notion.

name: Codify the Regency
description: Though Narutowicz's Regency isn't in dispute, his powers are, with him and the Seimas wishing to codify.

name: Loyalty to the Kingdom
description: \"...to defend the independence, territorial integrity and constitutional order of the Kingdom of Lithuania. I pledge to respect the languages, cultures and customs of Lithuania, to serve the Regentas, strengthen the basic principles of democracy and the rule of law in Lithuania. So help me God.\"

name: Promote the Krajowcy
description: Narutowicz proposes a new take on the Krajovcai/Krajowcy 'Fellow Countrymen' ideals. Opposed to drawing their cultural links to the Commonwealth, that they draw their culture from the old Grand Duchy of Lithuania, a multiethnic state, whose people referred to themselves as "Lithuanian" regardless of their mother tongue or religion.

name: Narutowicz's Plan
description: With the LAF threat all but removed, Narutowicz sets to his announce his vision of Lithuania.

name: Focus on the Economy
description: It appears that the Social Democrats have won out regarding the compromised deal with the LKDP regarding the economic reforms. This came from a position of strength considering the LKDP and their previous policies were the reason why Lithuania is in its current state...

name: Radical Land Reforms
description: To the surprise of the LSDP, Narutowicz has fiercely pushed for even more radical forms of land reform to ensure. It appears that regardless of Narutowicz noble background, he is willing to put Lithuania first.

name: Agribusinesses
description: Lithuania isn't a land of iron and steel, but of livestock and farmers. If Lithuania is to ensure stability in the economy, it must ensure that the backbone of it, is firmly secured.

name: Trade Schools
description: Not all people of Lithuania wish to seek to obtain a level of higher learning. This may be due to economical reasons, or due to their rural location. Narutowicz wishes to ensure that all people of Lithuanian are able to obtain a skill, with trade schools being opened up in rural areas.

name: Light Industrial Development
description: Lithuania industry is still very agrarian-based, with heavy industry still slowly being developed. With this in mind, further development of timber, peat and other related produce related to its agrarian industry in an effort to recover the economy

name: A Formal Arrangement
description: With no real lasting formal arrangement having been made between the Government and the Bundas, Narutowicz wishes to codify this relationship, which would be beneficial to both parties.

name: Balanced Industrial Focus
description: Most development in Lithuania has mainly been focused in Vilnius. Narutowicz wishes to promote development in both Kaunas and Bia≈Çystok and break any applied favouritism on Polish or Lithuanian development

name: Back in the Green
description: Through extreme adversity, Narutowicz has managed to pull Lithuania from the ashes and proven to be a boon to this nation. Though the curse of the firebird is still a lingering thought....

name: Narutowicz‚Äôs Broadcast
description: In these dark times, the people need to hear the voice of their leader, knowing that their plight isn't being ignored by those in the Ivory Towers of the Seimas.

name: Deal with the LAF Remnants
description: It appears that a small contingent of former LAF members wishes to resume their roles within the Lithuanian Army. Though of course, these positions are now null and void, they nonetheless wish to rejoin. This has made its way to the Seimas.

name: Basic Welfare
description: With tens of thousands left destitute due to the civil strife, both sides of the A≈°is have agreed to much needed aid and support for the average Lithuanian citizen via the means of welfare.

name: Self Reliance Compromise
description: Lithuania isn't a rich country in natural resources, and must take means to ensure we able to provide a level of self reliance. Even if this goes against the grain of our Bundas friends.

name: A Common Faith
description: Lithuania is a land of numerous religions, with most being of Abrahamic. With this, ≈†alkauskis wishes to embrace the commonality in these religions, to further promote unity within the nation

name: Christian Education Reforms
description: With a majority of the nation adheres to a form of Christianity, the promotion of Christian education is seen as paramount by those within the LKDP. This has met objections by the LSDP, though this in reality is a compromise with the allowance of Bundas schools and to no one's surprise has been backed by them.

name: Minority Representation
description: Currently within the Seimas, only the Poles are represented via their political party. Narutowicz, the previous leader of the organisation, wishes to expand this to also include other minorities of the nation to ensure that all voices are heard within the Seimas.

name: Matters of State
description: With the LSDP appearing to win the economic side of the compromise in the coalition, the LKDP have "won" the administration of Lithuania, with ≈†alkauskis and the "new guard" of the LKDP making headway regarding this

name: Adopt Mass Media
description: With the wireless radio and newspapers becoming the norm within Lithuanian society, Narutowicz has seen this as an opportunity to further promote his ideas via these platforms. Though there are those who see state funding best spend elsewhere, they can't deny the effectiveness of the media

name: Deal with the German Junkers
description: The German Junker question is the white elephant room few wish to address, though it appears Narutowicz hasn't been idle with his special investigation team has completed their dossier on the German Junkers and the Privy Council

name: Redefine the Lithuanian Culture
description: To the nationalist of Lithuania, to be Lithuanian, one must speak Lithuanian, adopt a Lithuanian way of life and call the capital Vilnius. These views must be removed wholesale, with a true Lithuanian drawing their heritage from the Grand Duchy, where the only measure was their loyalty to Lithuania and not the tongue they speak

name: Our Brethren in Klaipeda
description: Narutowicz's hasn't forgotten about those Lithuanians who reside across the Neman. Though Lithuania having direct control of these lands is all but a fool's dream at the moment, investing in the region, especially the port of Klaipƒóda, will greatly improve our standing with them.

name: From Vilnius to Bia≈Çystok
description: Regardless of one's mother tongue, we are all Lithuanians, from the shining coasts of the Baltic Sea to the deep forests of Podlasie.

name: The Succession Question
description: King Vytautas II had no children, so the succession would fall upon one of his younger brothers. These would however be even less prepared for the task of ruling the country. We should explore other options.

name: Federal States
description: Narutowicz has attempted to emulate the Swiss Canton system within the borders of Lithuania. This has resulted in various degrees of success, with Lithuania now divided into Federal states that have provided a level of stability Lithuania desperately needed.

name: A New Dawn
description: As the Republic of Lithuania has been proclaimed, the country can look forward to a new, stable and democratic future. Rejoice!

name: Martial Law Declared
description: The LAF threat is more severe than originally thought, with [LIT.GetRulingParty] declaring martial law to ensure the order is restored to Lithuania.

name: Secure Rural Areas
description: While [LIT.GetLeader] has already secured the capital, the rest of the country still lacks significant military presence.

name: War on the LAF
description: LIT_war_on_laf

name: Working Together
description: Poles and Lithuanians have had a turbulent history, from brothers in arms to a master and serf. Now in the Kingdom, a common enemy has again come and like the Deluge of the 17 century, we will come together to fight this enemy.

name: Loyalty to Plechavicius
description: \"...To defend the independence, territorial integrity and constitutional order of the Kingdom of Lithuania. I pledge to respect the state language, culture and customs of Lithuania, to serve our General, to strengthen the basic principles of democracy and the rule of law in Lithuania. So help me God\"

name: Lift Martial Law
description: Now that order has been restored, the time to lift martial law has come. Though one for a civilian government has not.

name: New Allies
description: To ensure the stability of Lithuania, the military is not enough. A country can not be run by quartermasters, civilian administrators, bureaucrats are needed. Anantas Merkys, the mayor of Kaunas has offered his help.

name: New Tax Regime
description: Cutting taxes across the board will free up our industrialists to reinvest their newfound money into our economy.

name: Coerce the Splinters
description: Having seen the horrors the LAF had been capable of, the Bundas should be easily convinced to help arming Lithuania against any foreign threats.

name: New Small Businesses
description: As we have established control over the Bundas, it is important to help our other citizens in starting new businesses.

name: Entrench Monopolies
description: The current monopolies of Lithuania are strong, independent companies. We should endeavour to keep this so, and help them keep their market share.

name: Increase Productivity
description: The final goal of our economic policies still need to be realised. We must increase the productivity of every Lithuanian worker to create a truly great economy.

name: Synthetic Experiments
description: Oil is the most important fuel of our century. As Lithuania possesses no useful sources of it, we must invest in research towards synthetic oil.

name: Expand the Arms Industry
description: All Lithuanian men should be able to work. And if they work, the best they can do is creating weapons to defend Lithuania.

name: An Industrial Council
description: We must create an Industrial Council to direct Lithuania's economy towards the inevitable war with Russia. While so far it has had limited success, it is time to further expand its powers.

name: Memel to Vilnius Railway
description: Seen as a military necessity, maintaining, upgrading, and protecting the railway from Memel (Klaipƒóda) to Vilnius would be vital if Lithuania is to revive any supplies from the Reichspakt

name: Empower Like-Minded Poles
description: Some of our Polish citizens are more open-minded to our proposals. It is only natural that we put them into positions of power, as a society can not be run by those who do not trust it.

name: Remember our History
description: Our history is a glorious and bloody one. It serves no one if it is forgotten.

name: Secure the succession
description: While one of the brothers of our late King has lost his title, he has two more. Let us ensure we get the better one.

name: A Coronation
description: With the Vytautas the II, King of Lithuania having passed on to the afterlife, we need a new vessel of showing God's power in our mortal realm.

name: The Threat to the East
description: Russia's territorial ambitions will always threaten the independence of our nation. Once Lithuania was part of Russia, and this is something we do not want to see again. As the Bear to the East begins mobilizing once more in an attempt to rebuild their Eastern European hegemony - Lithuania must prepare to give its all in the war to come or perish in the ensuing flames. Prepare to fight, or perish in the ensuring the storm.

name: [96.GetName] to [206.GetName]
description: [206.GetName], the capital of [WHR.getname], is set to be the frontline capital of any war with the Russian Bear. Efforts have been made to further supplement supply lines to [206.GetName] to ensure our forces can aid our Belarussian brothers.

name: Symbol of Unity
description: The King leads all of us Lithuanians. He is one of us no matter the language we speak or religion we follow.

name: A Caring Leader
description: The King not only unites us but cares for us. As any leader ruling by the grace of God, he has no other aims than the benefit of all Lithuanians.

name: Widen Public Appeal
description: There are still those, who are not fully committed to our government, and would rather continue our failed democratic experiment. Let us show them the error of their ways.

name: Rural Work Projects
description: We need to invest in locations that have been neglected by administrations of the past. That this will be done in such a way that it helps some groups more than others is nothing more than a coincidence.

name: A Land of Investment
description: While we have burned ourselves previously by being exposed to Black Monday, our newfound control over the economy allows us to welcome investments once again.

name: Control the Bundas
description: While the Industral Council has been effective, it has no control over the parts of the economy run by the Bundas. This will change, whatever the Bund members might think.

name: Class Collaboration
description: All of Lithuania works for one goal, be they a lowly worker, or the King himself.

name: Public Stamp of Approval
description: Lithuania has changed fast ever since the death of King Vytautas, and by according to many for the better. Let us show our remaining detractors that the people approve of the way the country is being run.

name: Controlled Research
description: Now that we have full control over the political sphere, there will be no outside influence on what our scientists investigate.

name: Remove Traitors
description: Many nationalists and socialists believe that their way would be better for Lithuania. Such revolutionary thoughts need to be explained in court, and - if necessary - purged by a bullet or the noose.

name: Lithuania Marches On
description: LIT_Plech_march
